response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I am confident it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its importance and rarity, I am offering you the chance to own this product for $950,000.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents a substantial discount compared to its true worth. Should you choose to accept, you will not only gain access to unparalleled quality and functionality but also secure a unique piece that could appreciate in value over time. I am eager to facilitate this transaction and look forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
